title: Small amounts of RP from Riot
body:
Hey Riot,
I was just wondering if there was any possibility that people could be given very small amounts of RP (in my case, around 87)? I'd like to buy a mystery gift for a friend but that leaves me a few RP short of buying Championship Kalista at the 975RP that she's advertised for on the PBE. Is there any chance of that amount of RP being gifted **OR**, in a probably better scenario, of Championship Kalista being on sale when the skin is released?
Thanks,
og1764

replies.body: yeah they rarely, if ever, give more than 30 rp

At 87 you're probably dreaming but you can try draw a picture and submit it to support to see if they can help you out
I imagine 87 might be a bit too far but can't hurt to try
